We launched trading in Minnesota, South Carolina and Puerto Rico

Residents of Minnesota, South Carolina and Puerto Rico can now trade all available US cryptocurrencies, deposit and withdraw USD using ACH or wire transfer, and buy crypto directly using their credit and debit cards.

We’re excited to announce that we have been awarded a money transmitter licensing (MTL) in the states of Minnesota and South Carolina and the US territory of Puerto Rico.

In an effort to continue our high-growth expansion, residents of Minnesota, South Carolina and Puerto Rico will now be able to:

  • Trade all available US cryptocurrencies (including Bitcoin, Ethereum, AAVE, Polygon and Uniswap).
  • Deposit and withdraw USD using ACH or wire transfers.
  • Purchase cryptocurrencies directly using their credit and debit cards.
  • Deposit and withdraw all available US cryptocurrencies.

This move is part of Bitstamp’s plans to expand its services in the United States while staying in line with the Federal, state and local laws and regulatory guidelines.

Being licensed in Minnesota, South Carolina and Puerto Rico marks an important milestone in our commitment to providing our customers in North America and around the world with the most secure and easy to use crypto services.
We launched trading in Minnesota and Puerto Rico
